titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to ensure reliable air service to American Samoa.
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to ensure reliable air service to American Samoa.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This bill declares that in order to provide and sustain air transportation in American Samoa between the islands of Tutuila and Manu'a, the Department of Transportation may renew a foreign air carrier's emergency air transportation exemption every 180 days (instead of the current 30-day renewal period that applies to other areas).
